p: On December 2019, a novel coronavirus, named Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) emerged in Wuhan City, Hubei Province, China, causing a cluster of pneumonia cases ( 1). Since then, the infection has spread worldwide causing more than a million cases and thousands of deaths ( https://gisanddata.maps.arcgis.com/apps/opsdashboard/index.html#/bda7594740fd40299423467b48e9ecf6).
